text.section:
The governing body of a county, the chief administrative officer in Montgomery County, or the supervisor in Baltimore City for any local taxes that are due, shall make allowances for:
insolvencies or removals as to personal property;
refunds made under law; or
decreasing or abating assessments under § 8-419 of this article.

On certificates by the governing body of a county, the chief administrative officer in Montgomery County, or the supervisor in Baltimore City, the Comptroller, for any State taxes that are due, shall make allowances for:
insolvencies and removals as to personal property;
refunds made under law; or
decreasing or abating of assessments under § 8-419 of this article.
